description: Table for the related multi Auth-Cert Avoidable Days Reason (I RFL 8509) item.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage for this referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REFERRAL_CVG_BED table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple avoidable days reasons associated with the referral and the coverage from the REFERRAL_CVG table.

columns.name: PADS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Coverage Level Possible Avoidable Days (PADS) Reason


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
